{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Mauler mini-torpedo | class = MaulerTorpedoWave | game = Strife }}[[Classes]]: MaulerTorpedoWave
The {{class|Mauler2|mauler's}} alternate mode detonation effect. 80 of these projectiles are launched upon detonation by the mauler's {{class|MaulerTorpedo|torpedo}}. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR MaulerTorpedoWave { {{Property|Speed}} 35 {{Property|Radius}} 13 {{Property|Height}} 13 {{Property|Damage}} 10 {{Property|DamageType}} {{DamageType|Disintegrate}} {{Property|Projectile}} +{{Flag|STRIFEDAMAGE}} {{Property|MaxStepHeight}} 4 {{Property|RenderStyle}} Add {{Property|Obituary}} "$OB_MPMAULER" // "%o was viciously vaporized by %k." States { Spawn: TWAV AB 9 Bright Death: TWAV C 9 Bright Stop } }
